content.question: Predict the percent of phenotypic males among the F1 offspring of the cross shown in the Punnett square if the offspring are raised at 22℃.

frqParts.text: Predict the percent of phenotypic males among the F1 offspring of the cross shown in the Punnett square if the offspring are raised at 22℃.

skill.text: 3.B: State the null hypothesis or predict the results of an experiment.
